divs: sighting detailsi went outside to smoke a cigarette on our upstairs deck. i was looking up at the sky like i usually do when i go outside and noticed something different about what i thought was a star at first then thought it must be a plane. it seemed to change shape like splitting into two objects but they looked connected. as i was watching i thought it must be a plane coming into the local airport - we live close by, but it didn't move along a path. i thought if its a plane it will pass over the treeline close to the house, but it didn't then i thought it was strange. it had colours that are a little hard to explain but i think they were kind of green \ blue and white and i thought i saw red at times. as i looked at it i thought it became a triangle because i could follow an outline of what looked like lights along the sides then the shape shifted and i thought it was going away, then it looked like it came back again and i saw the outline again. i thought 'oh it must be a ufo' and i kept staring at it, and i began to have an image in my mind of a blue line going out towards it and i was not scared or anything. it faded in and out and at one point completely disappeared, then came back and then disappeared again. at that time i put out my cigarette and came in to my husband and told him i thought i had seen a ufo. i then went to my computer to check my email and then our tv which was on began to buzz and the sound from it became distorted then went normal - my husband and i looked at each other and then the disotortion happened again. i told my husband that i thought i should call the police and report it, but decided not to in case they thought i was a crazy person. the whole event was over within about 10 minutes including the tv event.
Summary: Saw weird object in sky seemed to pulse change shape and colours saw outline went in and out and then disapeared
trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Juneau
There were no other sightings in Juneau on or around April 4th 2011
